description: A breathtaking mountain sunset with orange and purple sky reflecting on a serene alpine lake
Urban cityscape at night with illuminated skyscrapers and bustling streets filled with car lights
Peaceful beach at sunrise with golden light, gentle waves, and seagulls flying over the ocean
Winding forest path through tall green trees with dappled sunlight filtering through the canopy
Vast desert landscape with golden sand dunes under a clear blue sky and strong afternoon shadows
Powerful waterfall cascading down rocky cliffs surrounded by lush tropical vegetation and mist
